title: The Masked Singer's Robot is revealed and it's exactly who Lindsay Lohan thought it was
text:
The Masked Singer Australia's Robot was revealed and for once, Lindsay Lohan got it right.

When Cody Simpson emerged from the costume, Lindsay, who was pals with Cody because he dated her younger sister Ali, cried out in astonishment.

'I am literally in shock right now!' she gasped, adding: ' I can't believe this! I can't... I can't... I just need a minute.

Guess who! The Masked Singer's Robot was revealed on Monday's finale

'I can't even... I'm, like, blushing for my sister, 'cause I know how much she loves you,' she rambled, flustered.

Lindsay then revealed how she put the clues together, which included his love of the ocean.

She said to the young Australian singer: 'I remember that you wanted to go back home, and you wanted to play more guitar and get back to the ocean and just chill.'

Yep! Cody Simpson emerged from the costume, as many had predicted

Lindsay Lohan (pictured) got it right: Lindsay, who was pals with Cody because he dated her younger sister Ali, cried out in astonishment. 'I am literally in shock right now! I can't believe this! I can't... I can't... I just need a minute'

Cody replied: 'Very good detective, Lindsay, yeah. I got such a kick out of teasing everybody. It was awesome.'

Other guesses for the Robot included 5SOS star Ashton Irwin and One Direction's Niall Horan, and Cody said he'd be watching the show with the pair for a laugh.

'I'm mates with Niall, I'm mates with Ashton. I can't wait to go and tell them that, like, people thought that I was them. I'm gonna make sure they watch it!' he said.

Cody replied: 'Very good detective, Lindsay, yeah. I got such a kick out of teasing everybody. It was awesome'

Tune in! Other guesses for the Robot included 5SOS star Ashton Irwin and One Direction's Niall Horan, and Cody said he'd be watching the show with the pair for a laugh

Earlier in the episode, Lindsay told the Robot that if it's Cody in there, they have to have a chat off screen.

She told him: 'If it is you, we have a lot to talk about, and this is not the arena for it!'

Laughing, the actress added: 'I want my furniture back 'cause I bought your furniture for your house in Venice. And if it's not, I am so sorry.'
description: The Masked Singer Australia's Robot was revealed and for once, Lindsay Lohan got it right.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
